question: The Government has approved which armed force to set up 47 additional border outposts along the border?
explanation:
The Union Home Ministry has approved Indo-Tibetan Border Police (ITBP) to set up 47 additional border outposts.
The outposts are to be set up to enhance security along the border. This decision has been announced during the 59th Raising Day of Indo-Tibetan Border Police, which is one of the seven Central Armed Police Forces of India.
